cDynamicExpression::Value

cDynamicExpression::Value Struct Reference

#include <cdynamicexpression.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The dynamic expression evaluator calculates in Values.

Note: There is no long field in it: all numeric calculations are performed in floating point (double). While this is fine on 32-bit architectures, on 64-bit architectures some precision will be lost because IEEE double's mantissa is only 53 bits.

NOTE: Experimental class -- API is subject to change.
